StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary:
Trained Core Banking professional with an 01 years of experience skilled in Proficient in interfacing with clients for
understanding their requirements, suggesting most viable solutions and cultivating relations for customer retention & securing
business. Knowledge about risk management; adopting a performance-oriented assessment of the effective risk situation to
support value-based business management as well as help the organization in development of an optimal strategy and taking
right entrepreneurial decisions.
